author: Emery Glover
title: Sources: USC`s Spurrier to retire
text:
Sources: USC`s Spurrier to retire - WTOC-TV: Savannah, Beaufort, SC, News, Weather & Sports Member Center: Sources: USC`s Spurrier to retire Posted: 
According to multiple sources, South Carolina head coach Steve Spurrier is retiring. 
Sources say Spurrier told the team Monday night. 
Spurrier entered this week with an overall coaching record of 228-89-2. The Gamecocks are coming off their latest setback, a 45-24 loss to LSU in Baton Rouge. 
At this point, an interim coach has not been named. 
The team will hold a news conference on Tuesday at noon.
